Package com.atakmap.coremap.conversions

Class CoordinateFormatUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.coremap.conversions.CoordinateFormatUtilities
  • public class CoordinateFormatUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a common set of conversions from valid Coordinates in ATAK to the appropriate coordinate format requested.

                                                   CoordinateFormat entry)
        Parameters:

        entry - the coordinate format for the formatted string.
        Returns:

      • _convertToLatDegString

        public static java.lang.String _convertToLatDegString​(GeoPoint p,
                                                      boolean precise)
        Parameters:
        p - GeoPoint that describes a specific location
        precise - if precision is desired at the cost of speed
        Returns:
        The String formatted version of the Decimal Entry in Lat Form

      • _convertToLngDegString

        public static java.lang.String _convertToLngDegString​(GeoPoint p,
                                                      boolean precise)
        Parameters:
        p - GeoPoint that describes a specific location
        precise - is precision is desired at the cost of speed
        Returns:
        The String formatted version of the Decimal Entry in Lng Form

      • formatToStrings

        public static java.lang.String[] formatToStrings​(GeoPoint point,
                                                 CoordinateFormat entry)
        Parameters:
        point - the point to be formatted
        entry - the coordinate format for the formatted string.
        Returns:
        returns the formatted string in the requested coordinate format. The coordinate strings return break apart the coordinate elements into individual strings.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String coordinate,
                                      CoordinateFormat from,
                                      CoordinateFormat to)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        coordinate - the coordinate in string format
        from - the format of the coordinate string
        to - the format to convert the string to
        Returns:
        the converted string in the format defined by to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is an issue converting a between coordinate formats.

                                      CoordinateFormat from,
                                      CoordinateFormat to)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        coordinate - the initial coordinate in object array format.
        from - the coordinate of the object array
        to - the format to convert to
        Returns:
        the string in the format specified by the to parameter.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is an issue converting a between coordinate formats.

      • toDegreesMinutesSeconds

        public static double[] toDegreesMinutesSeconds​(double ddValue)
        Converts a decimal degree value to an array of degrees minutes seconds.
        Parameters:
        ddValue - the decimal degree value
        Returns:
        the resulting array with [0] = degrees, [1] = minutes, and [2] = seconds.

      • toDegreesMinutes

        public static double[] toDegreesMinutes​(double ddValue)
        Converts a decimal degree value to an array of degrees minutes.
        Parameters:
        ddValue - the decimal degree value
        Returns:
        the resulting array with [0] = degrees, [1] = minutes
